about_the_game:
Join the musical heroes league and enjoy an adventure filled with humor and music! In Rhythm League Heroes, you can use a group of charismatic characters to face diverse enemies through musical battles. Manage and improve your team to advance in the story and discover the different corners of the mysterious Sky Island.

Gameplay

Explore the universe of Rhythm League Heroes through gameplay reminiscent of classic JRPGs. Complete missions and get equipment for your heroes while uncovering the secrets that the plot holds. Face the challenge of dungeons in frenzied musical battles. Prepare your team before combat by choosing a character for each line, and destroy enemies by destroying their notes to the beat of the soundtrack.

Heroes

There are three categories: attack, tank, and support. Characters have active and passive abilities that will help defeat different enemies and offer unique ways to approach battles. Equip your characters and level them up to increase their combat power. Additionally, more characters can be recruited, which will bring new possibilities in combat.

Key Features

• Enjoy gameplay that offers the best of two genres: elements of classic JRPGs combined with musical battles.

• Use the special abilities of your characters to emerge victorious in action-packed and frenzied battles.
• Embark on an adventure to the Sky Island and enjoy a journey full of humor and musical references, getting to know unique characters and fighting powerful enemies.
• Explore the world of Rhythm League Heroes through beautiful 2D HD graphics.


Project made for the B.A. in Interactive Product Design degree of U-tad, University of Technology, Arts and Design.
